info.title: KeyVaultClient
info.description:
The key vault client performs cryptographic key operations and vault operations
against the Key Vault service.

get.description: Gets role assignments for a scope.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignments.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role
assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return
all role assignments at, above or below the scope for the specified principal.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignment.

parameters.name: roleAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the role assignment to get.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignment to create.

parameters.name: roleAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the role assignment to create. It can be any valid GUID.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the role assignment.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role assignment to delete.

parameters.name: roleAssignmentName
parameters.description: The name of the role assignment to delete.

get.description: Get all role definitions that are applicable at scope and above.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role definition.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
The filter to apply on the operation. Use atScopeAndBelow filter to search
below the given scope as well.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role definition to get. Managed HSM only supports '/'.

parameters.name: roleDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the role definition to get.

put.description: Creates or updates a custom role definition.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description:
The scope of the role definition to create or update. Managed HSM only supports
'/'.

parameters.name: roleDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the role definition to create or update. It can be any valid GUID.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for the role definition.

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the role definition to delete. Managed HSM only supports '/'.

parameters.name: roleDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name (GUID) of the role definition to delete.

post.description:
Creates a full backup using a user-provided SAS token to an Azure blob storage
container.

parameters.name: azureStorageBlobContainerUri
parameters.description:
Azure blob shared access signature token pointing to a valid Azure blob container where full backup needs to be
stored. This token needs to be valid for at least next 24 hours from the time of making this call.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

Retry-After.description:
The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in
Azure-AsyncOperation.

get.description: Returns the status of full backup operation

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The id returned as part of the backup request

put.description:
Restores all key versions of a given key using user supplied SAS token pointing
to a previously stored Azure Blob storage backup folder

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the key to be restored from the user supplied backup

parameters.name: restoreBlobDetails
parameters.description:
The Azure blob SAS token pointing to a folder where the previous successful
full backup was stored

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

Retry-After.description:
The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in
Azure-AsyncOperation.

put.description:
Restores all key materials using the SAS token pointing to a previously stored
Azure Blob storage backup folder

parameters.name: restoreBlobDetails
parameters.description: The Azure blob SAS token pointing to a folder where the previous successful full backup was stored.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

Retry-After.description:
The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in
Azure-AsyncOperation.

get.description: Returns the status of restore operation

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The Job Id returned part of the restore operation

get.description: Retrieves a list of all the available account settings that can be configured.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Retrieves the setting object of a specified setting name.

parameters.name: setting-name
parameters.description: The name of the account setting. Must be a valid settings option.

patch.summary: Updates key vault account setting, stores it, then returns the setting name and value to the client.
patch.description: Description of the pool setting to be updated

parameters.name: setting-name
parameters.description: The name of the account setting. Must be a valid settings option.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters to update an account setting.

Attributes.description: The object attributes managed by the KeyVault service.

enabled.description: Determines whether the object is enabled.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: ReleaseKey
values.description: Release an HSM key using Secure Key Release.

values.name: DownloadHsmSecurityDomainStatus
values.description: Check status of HSM security domain download.

values.name: ReadHsmSecurityDomainStatus
values.description: Check the status of the HSM security domain exchange file.

values.name: ReadHsmSecurityDomainTransferKey
values.description: Download an HSM security domain transfer key.

statusDetails.description: The status details of backup operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the full backup operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the backup operation in UTC

endTime.description: The end time of the backup operation in UTC

jobId.description: Identifier for the full backup operation.

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure blob storage container Uri which contains the full backup

OperationStatus.description: The status of a long-running operation.

notActions.description:
Action permissions that are excluded but not denied. They may be granted by
other role definitions assigned to a principal.

dataActions.description: Data action permissions that are granted.

notDataActions.description:
Data action permissions that are excluded but not denied. They may be granted
by other role definitions assigned to a principal.

statusDetails.description: The status details of restore operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the restore operation

endTime.description: The end time of the restore operation

RestoreOperationParameters.description: The authentication method and location for the restore operation.

sasTokenParameters.description: A user-provided SAS token to an Azure blob storage container.

folderToRestore.description: The Folder name of the blob where the previous successful full backup was stored

principalId.description: Returns role assignment of the specific principal.

value.description: The RoleAssignment items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

roleDefinitionId.description: The role definition ID used in the role assignment.

principalId.description:
The principal ID assigned to the role. This maps to the ID inside the Active
Directory. It can point to a user, service principal, or security group.

roleName.description: Returns role definition with the specific name.

value.description: The RoleDefinition items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SASTokenParameter.description: An authentication method and location for the operation.

token.description: The SAS token pointing to an Azure Blob storage container

useManagedIdentity.description:
Indicates which authentication method should be used. If set to true, Managed
HSM will use the configured user-assigned managed identity to authenticate with
Azure Storage. Otherwise, a SAS token has to be specified.

statusDetails.description: The status details of restore operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the selective key restore operation.

jobId.description: Identifier for the selective key restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the restore operation

endTime.description: The end time of the restore operation

SelectiveKeyRestoreOperationParameters.description: The authentication method and location for the selective key restore operation.

sasTokenParameters.description: A user-provided SAS token to an Azure blob storage container.

folder.description: The Folder name of the blob where the previous successful full backup was stored

name.description: The account setting to be updated

value.description: The value of the pool setting.

type.description: The type specifier of the value.

SettingTypeEnum.description: The type specifier of the value.

settings.description:
A response message containing a list of account settings with their associated
value.

value.description: The value of the pool setting.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.
